languages.text: "Но сначала я завершу свои обязательства перед тобой. Когда твои враги будут повержены, я оставлю тебя, но не раньше. Так рассудил мой компонент, носивший прежде имя Паскаль".

"But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."
languages.original_text: "Но сначала я завершу свои обязательства перед тобой. Когда твои враги будут повержены, я оставлю тебя, но не раньше. Так рассудил мой компонент, носивший прежде имя Паскаль".

traits.locale_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations towards you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you; but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations towards you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you; but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “但首先，我要先履行对你的义务。当你征服你的敌人之后，我便会与你分道扬镳，但在那之前，我会一直与你同行。那个曾经被称为‘帕斯卡’的零件就是这样判断的。”
languages.original_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."

traits.locale_text: “但首先，我要先履行对你的义务。当你征服你的敌人之后，我便会与你分道扬镳，但在那之前，我会一直与你同行。那个曾经被称为‘帕斯卡’的零件就是这样判断的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Pero primero cumpliré mis obligaciones hacia usted. Cuando sus enemigos hayan sido derrotados, me separaré de usted, pero no antes. Esa es la decisión tomada según el juicio de mi componente anteriormente conocido como Pasqal».
languages.original_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."

traits.locale_text: «Pero primero cumpliré mis obligaciones hacia usted. Cuando sus enemigos hayan sido derrotados, me separaré de usted, pero no antes. Esa es la decisión tomada según el juicio de mi componente anteriormente conocido como Pasqal».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「しかしその前に、私はあなたに対する義務を果たそう。あなたの敵が殲滅されたとき、私はあなたと別れる。だが、それはすぐのことではない。それが、かつてパスカルの名で知られた私の構成員の判断だ」
languages.original_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."

traits.locale_text: 「しかしその前に、私はあなたに対する義務を果たそう。あなたの敵が殲滅されたとき、私はあなたと別れる。だが、それはすぐのことではない。それが、かつてパスカルの名で知られた私の構成員の判断だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Doch zunächst werde ich meine Verpflichtungen Euch gegenüber ehren. Wenn Eure Feinde besiegt sind, werde ich mich von Euch verabschieden, aber keine Sekunde früher. Dies ist das Urteil meiner Komponente, die einst als Pasqal bekannt war."
languages.original_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."

traits.locale_text: "Doch zunächst werde ich meine Verpflichtungen Euch gegenüber ehren. Wenn Eure Feinde besiegt sind, werde ich mich von Euch verabschieden, aber keine Sekunde früher. Dies ist das Urteil meiner Komponente, die einst als Pasqal bekannt war."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mais avant toute chose, je vais m'acquitter de mes obligations envers vous. Je vous quitterai lorsque vos adversaires auront été vaincus, pas avant. Telle est la décision de mon composant autrefois connu sous le nom de Pasqal. »
languages.original_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."

traits.locale_text: « Mais avant toute chose, je vais m'acquitter de mes obligations envers vous. Je vous quitterai lorsque vos adversaires auront été vaincus, pas avant. Telle est la décision de mon composant autrefois connu sous le nom de Pasqal. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."

languages.text: "Her şeyden önce sana karşı sorumluluklarımı yerine getireceğim. Önce düşmanların yok edilecek, sonra yollarımız ayrılacka. Bir zamanlar Pasqal olarak bilinen bileşenimin hükmü bu şekildedir."
languages.original_text: "But first, I will make good on my obligations toward you. When your enemies have been vanquished, I will part ways with you, but no sooner. Such has been the judgement of the component of mine once known as Pasqal."

traits.locale_text: "Öncelikle sana karşı sorumluluklarımı yerine getireceğim ama. Düşmanların yok edildikten sonra seninle yollarımı ayıracağım, daha önce değil. Bir zamanlar Pasqal olarak bilinen bileşenimin hükmü bu şekilde."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
